Line 144: Line 144:
[[Ceedo]] is an alternative product with the key difference that it does not require Windows applications to be modified in order for them to be carried and run on the drive.
[[Ceedo]] is an alternative product with the key difference that it does not require Windows applications to be modified in order for them to be carried and run on the drive.
â
Similarly, other [[application virtualization]] solutions, such as [[VMware ThinApp]] or [[RUNZ]] can be used to run software from a flash drive without installation.
+
Similarly, other [[application virtualization]] solutions, such as [[VMware ThinApp]] (for Windows) or [[RUNZ]] (for Linux) can be used to run software from a flash drive without installation.
A range of [[portable application]]s which are all free of charge and able to run off a computer running Windows without storing anything on the host computer's drives or registry is available from [http://www.portableapps.com portableapps.com]; unlike U3 programs which run from a special U3-compatible USB stick, the PortableApps menu will run from a standard device, and can also use the Windows [[AutoRun]] feature.<ref>http://portableapps.com/node/9241</ref>
A range of [[portable application]]s which are all free of charge and able to run off a computer running Windows without storing anything on the host computer's drives or registry is available from [http://www.portableapps.com portableapps.com]; unlike U3 programs which run from a special U3-compatible USB stick, the PortableApps menu will run from a standard device, and can also use the Windows [[AutoRun]] feature.<ref>http://portableapps.com/node/9241</ref>
